# **II. Project Introduction** {#ii.-project-introduction}

## **1\. Overview** {#1.-overview}

### **1.1 Project Information** {#1.1-project-information}

* Project name: EduConnect- Development of an AI Virtual Assistant for Parent–Teacher Communication Portals in highschool  
* Project code: SU25QN07  
* Group name: EduConnect   
* Software type: Web Application, Mobile Application, AI

## **2\. Product Background** {#2.-product-background}

Through nationwide surveys conducted at various secondary schools, we identified a common challenge in communication between schools and families. Parents often struggle to keep track of their children’s academic progress—particularly when it comes to accessing timely and accurate information about class schedules, attendance, and extracurricular activities. At the same time, teachers are burdened with classroom management, student assessment, and the expectation of maintaining regular communication with parents.

Traditional communication methods such as physical contact books, scheduled parent-teacher meetings, or informal messaging groups (e.g., via Zalo or Facebook) have proven increasingly ineffective and fragmented in today’s rapidly evolving digital environment. These approaches are time-consuming and fail to ensure consistent and comprehensive information delivery to parents.

To address this widening gap, our project proposes the development of an AI-powered smart communication portal tailored specifically for secondary schools. This solution aims to reduce teachers’ workloads, automate responses to frequently asked questions, and provide parents with a centralized, seamless platform to monitor their children’s learning journey. By integrating AI with existing school systems, the platform not only tackles information overload but also empowers parents with greater flexibility and insight in supporting their children’s education.

## **3\. Existing Systems** {#3.-existing-systems}

### **3.1 SMAS Education** {#3.1-smas-education}

**3.1.1. System Description**   
SMAS (School Management System) is an online education management system developed by Viettel, aiming to support schools in comprehensively managing educational activities such as student information, scores, timetables, learning outcomes, and interactions with parents. SMAS allows schools to digitize data and improve educational management efficiency through a centralized, online platform.  
**3.1.2. System Components and Actors**  
The system consists of the following key components: 

- Server & management software: Store data and support school operations.  
- Web/app interface: Allows parents, students and teachers to access the system.  
- Administrators: Monitor and operate educational data.  
- Teachers: Enter scores, take notes and track students.  
- Parents & students: Look up learning information, class schedules, results.

**3.1.3. Key Features**

- Manage full student records (resume, academic results, conduct, etc.).  
- Enter scores, summarize and print transcripts automatically.  
- Track attendance, timetables, exam schedules and teaching plans.  
- Send automatic SMS/email messages to parents about academic results, attendance, etc.  
- Report statistics according to many criteria, support educational quality assessment.  
- Integrate with other systems such as education databases, enrollment systems, etc.

**3.1.4. Advantages** 

- Comprehensive management, reducing administrative work.  
- Update information quickly, accurately and synchronously.  
- Increase transparency and connection between schools \- parents \- students.  
- Can be accessed anytime, anywhere via the Internet.

**3.1.5. Disadvantages**

- Requires a stable Internet connection for effective use.  
- Depends on the accuracy of data entry by teachers and school staff.  
- Transitioning from traditional management methods may be difficult at first.  
- High security requirements due to storage of personal information and educational data.

**3.1.6. Link**

###  [https://smas.edu.vn/](https://smas.edu.vn/)

### **3.2 VnEdu** {#3.2-vnedu}

**3.2.1. System Description**  
VNEDU is an electronic education information system developed by VNPT to support seamless communication among schools, parents, and students through both web and mobile platforms. The system facilitates the management of academic information, grades, schedules, and school-parent  
**3.1.2. System Components and Actors**  
The system includes the following key components and users:  
\-Students: View grades, timetables, assignments, and announcements from teachers  
\-Parents: Monitor academic performance, behavior, and receive notifications from the school.  
\-Teachers: Input grades, provide comments, assign homework, and communicate with students and parents.  
\-School Administrators: Manage the entire system including teacher, student, class, and academic data.  
\-Server infrastructure & management software: Store and process data, ensuring security and uninterrupted service.  
**3.1.3. Key Features**   
	\-Offers video lessons, assignments, tests, and learning progress tracking.  
\-Allows parents to receive notifications, view grades, timetables, and communicate  with teachers.  
\-Helps teachers manage classwork, enter grades, and message parents.  
\-Provides personalized learning paths, question banks, and educational games.  
\-Includes facial recognition, voice identification, blockchain-based diploma verification, and e-payment support.  
**3.1.4. Advantages**   
	\-Fully integrated platform combining teaching, learning, and school management.  
	\-Saves time and effort for schools by automating administrative tasks.  
	\-Enhances parental involvement through timely academic updates.  
	\-Cloud infrastructure supports nationwide scalability.  
	\-Supports the digital transformation of the education sector.  
	  
**3.1.5. Disadvantages**  
	\-Requires internet access and digital devices for all users.  
	\-Teachers and parents unfamiliar with technology may face difficulties at first.  
\-Strict data privacy and system security must be maintained, especially with student information.  
\-Initial implementation and training may require time and resources.  
**3.1.6. Links** 

### [https://emis.misa.vn/](https://emis.misa.vn/)

**3.3 MISA school management application**  
**3.3.1. System Description**   
MISA EMIS is an online education management system developed by MISA Joint Stock Company, helping schools and education management agencies digitize all management activities such as student records, teaching, equipment, finance and interaction with parents. The system operates on a cloud computing platform, supporting access anytime, anywhere via browser or mobile application.  
**3.3.2. System Components and Actors**   
The system consists of the following key components:

- Server & online software: Store data, support operations for schools.  
- Web/app interface: For teachers, students, parents and managers.  
- Managers: System administration, report synthesis.  
- Teachers: Manage grades, attendance, learning materials.  
- Parents & students: Look up information, pay tuition, receive notifications via Zalo.

**3.3.3. Key Features** 

- Comprehensive management: students, teaching, finance, equipment, medical, library, documents.  
- Online enrollment support.  
- Send tuition notices to students via Zalo, pay tuition online.  
- Integrate electronic invoices, digital signatures.  
- Voice assistant for principals.  
- Synthesize quick and accurate reports for managers.  
- Apply barcodes in library management.

**3.3.4. Advantages**

- Centralized, synchronized and comprehensive management.  
- Modern technology, easy to deploy, no need for infrastructure investment.  
- Access anytime, anywhere via the Internet.  
- Continuous support 365 days/year.  
- Trusted by more than 23,000 educational institutions nationwide.  
- Suitable for all levels from preschool to high school.

**3.3.5. Disadvantages**

- Depends on a stable internet connection.  
- Requires time to familiarize and train new users.  
- Requires data security and privacy.

**3.3.6. Links**  
[https://web.enetviet.com/](https://web.enetviet.com/)

## **4\. Business Opportunity** {#4.-business-opportunity}

Vietnam's education sector is a large and fast-growing market, driven by digital transformation. Traditional communication methods like contact books, parent meetings, or chat groups are becoming outdated and fail to meet the need for timely and comprehensive updates between schools and parents.

Our AI-Integrated Communication Portal helps teachers easily share grades, schedules, and announcements, while allowing parents to track their children's progress in real time. This reduces teacher workload and strengthens school-family connections.

The product aligns with government policies supporting digital education and uses a flexible SaaS revenue model based on school size. Built on a cloud-based system, it offers high scalability and can be expanded with features like learning analytics and LMS integration in the future.

## **5\. Software Product Vision** {#5.-software-product-vision}

- The project “Developing an AI Virtual Assistant for the Communication Portal between High School Parents and Teachers” aims to build an intelligent virtual assistant system integrated into the school’s communication portal, supporting the automation of information exchange between teachers and parents. The assistant is capable of receiving and responding to common inquiries related to students’ academic performance, class schedules, attendance records, school announcements, and relevant events.  
- The product is designed to enhance communication efficiency between schools and families, reduce repetitive tasks for teachers, and enable parents to conveniently and proactively access information in a timely manner. The project is tailored to fit the existing technological infrastructure of high schools, ensuring feasibility, cost-effectiveness, and ease of large-scale deployment.

## **6\. Project Scope & Limitations**  {#6.-project-scope-&-limitations}

### **6.1 Major Features** {#6.1-major-features}

**6.1.1 Web application for Admin**   
As a user in the position of an admin using web application, I would like to use the following features:  
FE-01. Login/Logout   
FE-02. Add users (teacher, student, parent,School administrator)  
FE-03. Edit users (teacher, student, parent,School administrator)  
FE-04. Delete users (teacher, student, parent,School administrator)  
FE-05.Create account (teacher, student, parent,School administrator)  
FE-06. Manage master data (Class list, Subject list, Academic schedule)  
FE-07. Import academic schedules (linked with attendance and violation tracking)  
**6.1.2 Web application for Homeroom teacher**  
As a user in the position of homeroom teacher using web application, I would like to use the following features:  
FE-8. Login/ Logout   
FE-9. View list leave request  
FE-10. Approve the leave request   
FE-11. Reject the leave request  
FE-12. View list of student   
FE-13. View feedback from subject teachers by class period per day  
FE-14. AI-based feedback summarization  
FE-15. Upload final grades (predefined format)  
FE-16. Create meeting schedule (date, time, venue, meeting content)  
FE-17. Send meeting schedules to parents via SMS  
**6.1.3 Web application for Subject Teacher**  
As a user in the position of subject teacher using web application, I would like to use the following features:  
FE-18. Login/Logout  
FE-19. View teaching schedule  
FE-20. Update learning slot status ( not started, on going, finish)  
FE-21. Feedback or comment at the end of the lesson  
FE-22. Feedback for the whole class  
FE-23. Feedback for one group or multiple groups  
FE-24. Create a class leave request  
FE-25. Edit leave request  
FE-26. Delete leave request 

**6.1.4 Web application for School administrator**  
As a user in the position of school administrator  using web application, I would like to use the following features:  
FE-27. Login/ Logout  
FE-28. Reject the request   
FE-29. Accept the request   
FE-30. Assign teacher  
FE-31. Send notifications to the teacher or student  
FE-32. Manage system regulations and policy-related violations

**6.1.5 Web application Parents**  
As a user in the position of parents using web application, I would like to use the following features:  
FE-33. Login/ Logout  
FE-34. View list of children  
FE-35. View detailed information of a child  
FE-36. Configure notification preferences  
FE-37. View feedback from subject teachers for each class session or weekly summary  
FE-38. View meeting schedules with teachers  
FE-39. Create leave application   
**6.1.6 Web application for Student**   
FE-40. Login/Logout  
FE-41. View class schedule  
FE-42. View final grades  
FE-43. Create a re-evaluation request   
FE-44. Receive notifications from the school  
FE-45. View exam schedule

### **6.2 Limitations & Exclusions** {#6.2-limitations-&-exclusions}

LI-01: The system does not manage class funds or students’ personal finances.

LI-02:The system does not manage or control student grades directly.
